sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Search, MessageSquare, ChevronLeft, PlayCircle, Send, Menu, Info, Leaf, Sun, Sparkles, BookOpen, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; // --- Mock Data --- const FILTERS = ["All", "Medicinal", "Culinary", "Beverage", "Ornamental"]; const PLANTS = [ { id: 1, name: "Brazilian Spinach", scientific: "Alternanthera sissoo", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1628608212574-e8d1976008b8?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=600", category: "Culinary", overview: "Brazilian Spinach is a low-growing perennial vegetable valued for its crunchy texture and high nutritional value.", characteristics: "Height: 30cm-50cm. Leaves: Crinkled, glossy green. Growth: Spreading ground cover.", nutritional: "High in Iron, Vitamin A, and Vitamin C. Contains high levels of carotenoids.", uses: "Traditionally used to improve eye health and strengthen the immune system.", care: "Light: Partial shade to full sun.\nWater: Keep soil moist but not waterlogged.\nSoil: Rich, well-draining soil." }, { id: 2, name: "Torch Ginger", scientific: "Etlingera elatior", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1596726658098-84c207903823?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=600", category: "Medicinal", overview: "A stunning plant known for its bright pink flower buds which are a key ingredient in local laksa dishes.", characteristics: "Height: Up to 5m. Flowers: Large, pink/red waxy petals.", nutritional: "Rich in antioxidants and antibacterial properties.", uses: "The flower bud is sliced into salads and curries. Traditionally used to treat earaches.", care: "Light: Full sun.\nWater: High water requirement.\nSoil: Fertile, high organic matter." }, { id: 3, name: "Sand Ginger", scientific: "Kaempferia galanga", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1615485925763-867862f7253a?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=600", category: "Medicinal", overview: "A stemless herb arising from a tuberous rhizome, widely used in traditional medicine and cooking.", characteristics: "Leaves: Round, lying flat on the ground. Rhizome: Aromatic.", nutritional: "Contains essential oils like ethyl cinnamate.", uses: "Used to treat indigestion, colds, and pectoral pains. Also used as a spice in rice dishes.", care: "Light: Shade.\nWater: Moderate.\nSoil: Loamy soil." }, { id: 4, name: "Wild Betel Leaf", scientific: "Piper sarmentosum", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1621506822262-421733614918?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=600", category: "Culinary", overview: "Known locally as 'Daun Kaduk', this plant is often confused with the betel nut vine.", characteristics: "Leaves: Heart-shaped, glossy. Growth: Creeper.", nutritional: "High in calcium and antioxidants.", uses: "Leaves are used as wrappers for snacks like 'Miang Kham'.", care: "Light: Partial shade.\nWater: Regular watering.\nSoil: Moist soil." }, { id: 5, name: "Turmeric", scientific: "Curcuma longa", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1615485290382-441e4d049cb5?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=600", category: "Medicinal", overview: "A flowering plant of the ginger family, the roots of which are used in cooking.", characteristics: "Rhizomes: Bright orange-yellow inside.", nutritional: "Contains curcumin, a powerful anti-inflammatory compound.", uses: "Major ingredient in curry powders. Used in Ayurvedic medicine for inflammation.", care: "Light: Full sun to partial shade.\nWater: Keep moist.\nSoil: Well-drained." }, { id: 6, name: "Butterfly Pea", scientific: "Clitoria ternatea", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1631128795552-32d398e09e13?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=600", category: "Beverage", overview: "A plant species belonging to the family Fabaceae, known for its vivid blue flowers.", characteristics: "Flowers: Deep blue with yellow markings. Growth: Vine.", nutritional: "Rich in anthocyanins.", uses: "Flowers are used to color food blue and to make tea.", care: "Light: Full sun.\nWater: Moderate.\nSoil: Neutral pH." } ]; const CHAT_MESSAGES = [ { id: 1, sender: 'bot', text: "Hello! I'm your Heritage Garden Assistant. How can I help you today?" }, ]; // --- Home Screen --- const HomeScreen = ({ onNavigate }) => { return (

Heritage Garden

Botanical Collection

Discover Traditional Botanicals

Explore Malaysia's
Heritage Plants

Journey through centuries of botanical wisdom, from medicinal herbs to culinary treasures.

What We Offer

Comprehensive resources for plant enthusiasts

Plant Database

Access detailed information on traditional plants, their uses, and care instructions.

AI Assistant

Get instant answers about plant care, traditional uses, and cultivation tips.

Guided Tours

Experience immersive audio-guided tours through our botanical heritage.

150+
Plant Species
500+
Traditional Uses
50+
Medicinal Plants
24/7
AI Support
); }; // --- Search Screen --- const SearchScreen = ({ onPlantClick, onBack }) => { const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState("All"); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(""); const filteredPlants = PLANTS.filter(p => { const matchesFilter = activeFilter === "All" || p.category === activeFilter; const matchesSearch = p.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || p.scientific.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()); return matchesFilter && matchesSearch; }); return (

Plant Collection

{filteredPlants.length} plants found

setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search by name or scientific name..." className="w-full bg-[#F5F3EF] border-2 border-transparent rounded-2xl py-4 pl-12 pr-4 focus:outline-none focus:border-[#6B8E4E] focus:bg-white transition-all text-[#1A2E11] placeholder:text-[#9CA89A]" />
{FILTERS.map((filter) => ( ))}
{filteredPlants.map(plant => (
onPlantClick(plant)} className="bg-white rounded-3xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg border-2 border-[#E8E6E0] hover:border-[#6B8E4E] hover:shadow-2xl transition-all cursor-pointer group" >
{plant.category}

{plant.name}

{plant.scientific}

{plant.overview}

))}
{filteredPlants.length === 0 && (

No plants found

Try adjusting your search or filter

)}
); }; // --- Plant Detail Screen --- const PlantDetailScreen = ({ plant, onBack }) => { if (!plant) return null; return (
{plant.category}

{plant.name}

{plant.scientific}

Overview

{plant.overview}

Characteristics

{plant.characteristics}

Nutritional Value

{plant.nutritional}

Traditional & Modern Uses

{plant.uses}

Care Instructions

{plant.care.split('\n').map((line, i) => (
{line}
))}
); }; // --- Chat Screen --- const ChatScreen = ({ onBack }) => { const [messages, setMessages] = useState(CHAT_MESSAGES); const [input, setInput] = useState(""); const endRef = useRef(null); const handleSend = () => { if (!input.trim()) return; setMessages([...messages, { id: Date.now(), sender: 'user', text: input }]); setInput(""); setTimeout(() => { setMessages(prev => [...prev, { id: Date.now() + 1, sender: 'bot', text: "I'm still learning about the garden! Ask me about specific plants like Brazilian Spinach or Turmeric for detailed information." }]); }, 1000); }; useEffect(() => { endRef.current?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); }, [messages]); const suggestedQuestions = [ "What are the benefits of Turmeric?", "How do I care for Brazilian Spinach?", "Which plants are good for tea?" ]; return (

AI Assistant

Ask about plants & care

{messages.length === 0 && (

How can I help?

Ask me anything about our plant collection

{suggestedQuestions.map((q, i) => ( ))}
)} {messages.map((msg) => (
{msg.text.split('\n').map((line, i) => ( {line} {i < msg.text.split('\n').length - 1 &&
} ))}
))}
setInput(e.target.value)} onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSend()} placeholder="Type your question..." className="w-full bg-[#F5F3EF] border-2 border-transparent rounded-2xl py-4 pl-6 pr-14 focus:outline-none focus:border-[#6B8E4E] focus:bg-white transition-all text-[#1A2E11] placeholder:text-[#9CA89A]" />
); }; // --- Main App Component --- export default function App() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); const [selectedPlant, setSelectedPlant] = useState(null); const handleNavigate = (tab) => { setActiveTab(tab); setSelectedPlant(null); }; const handlePlantClick = (plant) => { setSelectedPlant(plant); }; const renderContent = () => { if (activeTab === 'home') return ; if (activeTab === 'search') { return selectedPlant ? setSelectedPlant(null)} /> : handleNavigate('home')} />; } if (activeTab === 'chat') return handleNavigate('home')} />; return ; }; return (
{renderContent()}
); }
